title: DELIRIOUS | English meaning - Cambridge Dictionary
text: delirious adjective uk /dɪˈlɪr.i.əs/ us /dɪˈlɪr.i.əs/She had a high temperature and was delirious. - afebrile - ague - anaplasmosis - anti-malaria - anti-malarial - bubonic plague - fevered - German measles - helicobacter pylori - hepatitis A - hepatitis B - hepatitis C - Hib - mononucleosis - rabbit fever - relapsing fever - remittent fever - Reye's syndrome - rheumatic fever - Rift Valley fever You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
